Service Details: Offers financial assistance to individuals and families who would benefit from joining the Y, but are financially unable to pay the full fee
How to Apply: - Applications are available in person or online- Please read and complete an application and mail or drop off your application and supporting documents to Member Services, being sure to include your email address- All are encouraged to take a tour of the facilities and learn about services and programs prior to applying
Address & Map: 375 Hartman RdKelowna, BC     V1X 2M9View MapQuest Map
